solution.text:
Total surface area of the hemipshere, TSA \(=_{{trunc((3*pi_val*j**2),3)}}_\,cm^2\)
\(\Rightarrow 3 \pi r^2=_{{trunc((3*pi_val*j**2),3)}}_\)
\(\Rightarrow r^2 =\frac{_{{trunc((3*pi_val*j**2),3)}}_}{3 \pi}\)
\(\Rightarrow r=_{j}_\,cm\)
Volume of the hemisphere, \(V=\frac23 \pi r^3\)
\(= \frac23 \pi \times _{j}_^3\)
\(\Rightarrow V = _{{trunc(((2/Decimal(3))*pi_val*j**3),3)}}_\,cm^3\)

content.text: The volume of a hemisphere, whose total surface area is \(_{{trunc((3*pi_val*j**2),3)}}_\,cm^2\).
